issue_description: The Gantt chart view fails to load when a project exceeds 500 tasks.
Exporting the project timeline to PDF cuts off the right side of the document.
Automated task assignment rules are not firing when a subtask is marked complete.
Dragging tasks between sprints sometimes duplicates the task instead of moving it.
The resource allocation heatmap shows zero hours for users who have active tasks.
Custom fields disappear from the task details panel after refreshing the browser.
Mobile app (iOS) crashes immediately when attempting to upload an attachment larger than 5MB.
Email notifications for overdue tasks are being sent 4 hours late consistently.
When filtering tasks by tag, the application displays an 'Internal Server Error 500' message.
The keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+T) for creating a new task is non-functional in the desktop application.
Time tracking widget intermittently fails to stop recording time, resulting in inflated hours.
Dashboard widgets rearrange themselves randomly every time I log in.
Dependency linking between projects fails silently without providing an error message.
Trying to bulk edit task priorities resets all selected tasks to 'Medium'.
The built-in video conferencing integration initiates a call but video remains black.
Custom branding logo appears stretched and pixelated in the public sharing view.
Historical data logging for task status changes seems corrupted for Q3 2023.
The API endpoint for fetching project metadata is returning a 403 forbidden error.
Recurring tasks generated this week all have the wrong assignee (defaulting to the creator).
Attempting to archive a completed project triggers a perpetual loading spinner.
When using the dark mode theme, text input fields become invisible against the background.
The Slack integration posts updates twice for every single task completion.
The 'Recently Viewed' list only shows projects from last month, ignoring recent activity.
Users cannot delete comments containing emojis, resulting in a 'Database Constraint Violated' warning.
Performance slows drastically when more than 20 users are concurrently viewing the same Kanban board.
The estimated budget tracking feature miscalculates totals after applying a currency exchange rate.
Calendar view incorrectly displays tasks set for GMT+5 as set for GMT-5.
Spell check function within task descriptions marks all technical jargon as incorrect.
We lost visibility of all attached files on tasks created before January 1st.
The 'Print' function prints only the header and footer, skipping all task content.
Requesting the ability to set dynamic start dates based on dependent task completion (start-to-start dependencies).
Need a dedicated client portal view where clients can only see specific reports and milestones, not internal comments.
Please add support for two-way synchronization with Microsoft Project files (.mpp).
We need a mandatory approval workflow before tasks can be moved to the 'Done' column.
Ability to create customizable risk registers directly within the project workspace.
Enhance reporting to calculate team velocity based on complexity points (Story Points) instead of raw task count.
Integration request for Salesforce to automatically create project tasks based on closed opportunities.
Allow users to save custom filter presets globally for the entire organization.
Requesting an option to view workload capacity in hours per week rather than just task count.
Implement an AI summary feature for long comment threads.
Ability to lock specific columns on a Kanban board to prevent unauthorized task movement.
We require multi-level subtasks (currently limited to one level).
Dedicated template library for common IT deployment projects.
Please implement a bulk notification suppression feature for large imports.
Need a dedicated 'waiting on client' status that automatically pauses time tracking.
Provide enterprise SSO capabilities using Okta or Azure AD.
Feature request: Baseline tracking for project schedules to compare actual progress against the original plan.
Allow conditional logic in custom forms (e.g., if answer A is Yes, show field B).
We want a visual tool for diagramming workflow flows (like Lucidchart integration).
Requesting the ability to customize the layout of the project overview page.
Implement integrated meeting scheduling directly tied to task deadlines.
Need a way to set budget thresholds that trigger automatic alerts when spending approaches the limit.
Please allow embedding external live dashboards (e.g., Tableau) into project views.
Add a voice note recording feature for quick task comments on the mobile app.
We need granular permission settings for individual task comments (e.g., private comments).
Requesting a dedicated timeline view optimized for portfolio management across 50+ projects.
Allow drag-and-drop file organization within the project file repository.
Ability to tag resources as 'Contractor' or 'Internal' for better budget tracking segregation.
We need robust version control for project documentation stored within the platform.
Please add support for localization in traditional Chinese.
Why was my credit card charged twice this month? Need clarification on invoice #2024-555.
We need to downgrade our subscription from Enterprise to Pro next month. How do we initiate this?
I cannot access previous invoices; the link in the billing portal results in a 404 error.
Can we get a quote for adding 50 more seats to our current annual plan?
My organization is tax-exempt; how can I submit our exemption certificate?
I need to update the billing contact email address from personal@ to finance@.
The recent increase in seat price was unexpected. Please explain the justification for the change.
Requesting an immediate refund for a user seat that was deactivated three days after renewal.
We require annual payment instead of monthly; how do we change the billing cycle?
I received an overdue payment notice, but payment was submitted last week. Please confirm receipt.
The invoice shows charges for a third-party add-on we never activated.
We accidentally paid for two separate accounts. Can they be merged, and the redundant payment credited?
I need a comprehensive breakdown of usage per department for cost allocation purposes.
The link to download the Statement of Work (SOW) for our Enterprise agreement is broken.
Can we trial the Portfolio Management add-on for 30 days before committing to the cost?
I cannot log in using my corporate Google Workspace credentials; OAuth flow fails at redirection.
How do I transfer ownership of the master account to our new CTO, as the original owner left the company?
I forgot my security key phrase and the password reset link never arrives in my inbox.
A former employee still appears in the active user list; please advise on proper deactivation procedure.
Our IP address range changed; the old security restrictions are now locking out all users.
We need to enforce mandatory two-factor authentication (2FA) for all users, but the setting is disabled in the admin panel.
I am receiving permission denied errors when attempting to view Project X, but I am listed as a team lead.
Please whitelist the IP address 192.168.1.100 for API access, as it is currently blocked.
My login session expires every 15 minutes, which is disruptive. Can we extend it to 8 hours?
The user provisioned yesterday cannot see the shared workspace, only their private tasks.
I accidentally deleted my account. How can it be recovered?
We need to implement Single Log Out (SLO) functionality for security compliance.
Why is there a 5-minute delay between user creation and account activation visibility?
I am unable to change my profile picture; the upload button does nothing.
The user license count shows 5/10 used, but only 4 active users are listed. Who is the ghost user?
General feedback: The onboarding process for new team members is excellent and very intuitive.
We are considering migrating from Jira. Can you provide a detailed comparison guide on feature parity?
Is there a public roadmap we can view to anticipate upcoming features for Q4?
How does your company handle data residency and GDPR compliance for EU customers?
The knowledge base article on 'Creating Custom Reports' contains outdated screenshots. Please update.
The performance improvements in the last update were fantastic! Thank you for the speed boost.
Inquiry: We are looking for professional services assistance to help set up our complex workflows.
What is the expected uptime SLA for Enterprise customers, and where can I track current status?
The design update changed the placement of the 'Archive' button; it's now harder to find. Minor UI feedback.
We notice your API has rate limits. Can these be raised for high-volume integrations?
